text:
The LEMON PEPPER FISH !!!!!  
Must have!!! We're from Cali and this is the best food since arriving to NC!
Totally incredible stuff!! I can't say I've ever eaten at a food truck that was this good !! The only complaint is I had to stand eating all of this delicious-ness .
Food was amazing!  Ordered the Tails Basket and the Lemon Pepper Basket flavor was perfect.  Each basket comes with hush puppies and fries portions are good. Recommend this place 100%
